content.detailedDescription: Grilling steaks on patio. perfect visibility to view  stars so i got binoculars. noticed a strange amorphous cloud-like form moving at constant rate from sw to nw. thought it was smoke cloud or flying dedris.  binoculars revealed a huge seemingly solid craft with very distinct rows of dim rectangular windows/lights that were part of the craft, not separate objects. they revealed a distinct triangular craft moving totally silent. i used to fly a small plane and was in the military and have some perspective as to distance,elevation and relative size. the thing was stunningly and clearly a craft. it seemed to be 300 to 400 ft wide at 3000 to 5000 ft high moving at 175 to 200 mph.  total observation about 6 t0 10 seconds as it continued over my roofline and out of sight. i have never seen anything like a ufo or strang object before. this is without question ,at least for me, absolute proof that intelligently designed  and operated craft that have no known explanation are real. i was stunned at the clarity and certainty of this object and the entire event. i do not use drugs or alcohol , am in excellent healty, own a small business and am very social. the ramifications of this experience are sure to be interesting for the rest of my life.
content.summary: Brownish cloudlike  with naked eye,binoculars revealed huge object with dim square lights  revealing triangle craft. seemed solid. no sound. constant velocity.

content.detailedDescription:
As i was traveling south bound on i-95 heading towards i-15 i was on the phone with my mother when i saw i multiple orb objects making what looked like a pyramid, perfect triangle, and the bottom set was making another three dimensional object. they where like blue orb very bright object making insane maneuvers back and forth. then they looked like they made dna strand. i saw this and looking at a map, i feel these were about 500 feet off the ground over neighborhoods towards nellis afb. they were making maneuvers and changes, i have never seen anything man made make before. checking the internet the next couple of days, someone made a video of what i saw. here is the link to the video. 



[link removed/cms/dr]
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Multiple orb ufo's making shapes pyramid and others w/ video

content.detailedDescription:
I just saw a real ufo!!!
laying on my back in my pool. came out of the north, very high, small going extremely fast. went to east, then to the south and then south east.
did not travel in straight line, looked like it moved from side to side by 40 or 60 feet very rapidly. i would say less than 2 seconds from first sight to end, covered the entire visible sky. that is fast from north to south, clear across the sky.
amazing moves. never seen anything like it. defiantly nothing made on this planet.
i can see why no one ever has pictures of them, to fast, all to quick. i yelled maria, and it was gone. i turned around in pool as fast as i could and watched it disappear, looked like it went up as it disappeared. 
  sure was fast and nimble. this thing also looked like it was varying in altitude by huge amounts as it went.
[witness name removed/cms/dr]
content.summary: Extremely fast, eratic, coverend noth to south in less than 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a black and mild i look up and see a round (sphere) like object smoothly flying in the sky i paused because i look to make aire my eyes where not playing tricks on me then staired and couldn't pull away it changed direction and then i look away for a sec then it was gone.I noticed my phone died before i could take pictures
content.summary: Round moved about north shot down a lil then went about nw

content.detailedDescription:
thursday, march 5, 2015, between 4:10 pm, and 4:30 pm, my friend and i were driving on 70 w. heading towards columbus, and took the outer belt, 270 s. to go to the counseling center where i work. as we were driving, i was sitting in the passenger seat, looking at the front window, i looked up into the sky, and off to my left at about the 11 o'clock position, i noticed a black shiny disc hovering up in the sky. the disc was circular nature, and had a body which is black that had a whitish outline around it. this could have been from the sun, and i am not sure, but this makes the most sense to me. i guesstimate that the craft was between 250 and 350 feet long and approximately 1/3 of that measurement, in height.

        i look down to pick up my phone so that i can shoot a picture, and when i looked up, the craft had in that small of time, moved to a position that i estimate to be about 10 to 15 miles away, and was positioned in what i believe to be the front of a cloud. i snapped 2 pictures, and when i looked up to take a third, it was gone. if you look at the pictures you will see definitive white beam of light, coming down from the craft, which appears as a small circular shaped object behind the front of the cloud. i took 2 more pictures to show both the traveling motion of the car that i was in, and the change in scenery along the highway, by which you can gauge distance travelled.

water marked pictures, soon to followâ€¦
content.summary: Watched hovering blackish ufo hover, then move about 5-10 miles away, and emit a light beam.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just come in to work at the automobile association hq in halesowen for an evening shift and was called over by 4-5 colleagues who were watching something out of the east wing window in the operations centre. they pointed to about 20 silver orbs - reflective like chrome ball bearings floating across our view in a steady formation. the majority of these continued on their journey - 2 of these stayed back and performed some incredible aerobatics shooting vertically through the cloud layer (which was quite low but visibility was otherwise crystal clear) - the sun was still setting and the sunset was reflecting on the under side of these objects. their manouevres were totally off the scale as in their agility. i have been to may air shows and never seen any conventional plane perform such darting aerobatics. if a pilot had been on board these objects, they would have certainly been killed due to the inertia and g-force. i could only say that who ever- or what ever was controlling or flying these orbs, was having a bit of a good time judging by how "playful" their aerobatics were -it was almost like a game of cat and mouse. definitely intellignetly controlled - and someone with a personality! after 10-15 minutes, these few objects then continued in their journey in the same direction of their comrades. i happened to have the phone number of the ministry of defence in whitehall - uk - and reported the sighting. they in turn reported it to the police force in brierley hill (j1 group) who then passed on the details of the report to the local newspapers - it made front page news the next day. when i came back in the next day for may shift, my colleagues said that the phones had gone mad with ufo groups and researchers who wanted to speak to me. the newsapapers wanted to speak to me as well and took my statement - none of my colleagues would speak to them as they were afraid of ridicule.
i still have to newspaper cutting for that date. i feel so lucky to have seen probably the largest sighting in the u.K. of these objects. obviously in 1997 there was no internet - since then, i can totally tie this sighting to exactly the same as those sightings in mexico where these orbs seem to be seen most often. the fact that this sighting ties in with the mexican ones - before the age of the internet says a lot - yes the mexican people can be quite superstitious but that doesn't change the facts. the fact that i saw the sunset on the underside of these objects means that they were solid and they were there! - aside from us at the aa, there was only one other official report and that was from someone who was walking at the same time over the clent hills - 3 miles away - the clent hills has an elevation of 1000 ft above sea level. so. what do you think. i will stand by my statement for the rest of my life and would gladly be interviewed by anyone and stand my ground to say that what i and my colleagues saw was true.
content.summary: Silver spherical orbs - appx the size of a small car. 20 in total all moving in same direction initially. 4-5 of these peeled off and stayed behind and performed totally unrealy aerobatics and then continued on the same flight path as the rest..

content.detailedDescription:
We were vacationing at sunriver resort with family. we were just sledding my daughter around in the new fallen snow taking pictures of the beautiful scenery. when i took this particular picture i hadn't even noticed the objects. only later while reviewing photos i noticed the objects. i immediately thought they were some kind of ufo. the one particular object stood out to me and i zoomed in on it and was blown away by what i saw. not only that object but another in close proximity to it. it was a reflective or white color with a black top and bottom. the object next to this one was a long bar shape with some of the same coloring. i then saw to the left of these objects much further away another object that in the photo is the shape of a small boot and was a white color also. i think if i had actually seen the objects in real time i would have been way more shocked, but for now i have no idea. could these just be marks from my camera. i really hope you can clear this up for me. i would love to know and would be excited to know if i actually have some real evidence that we are not alone here.
thank you for your time,
[name removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Didn't really notice the ufo while taking picture. discovered as i was reviewing photos.

content.detailedDescription: Its a picture my cousin took i noticed a craft in the sky.  i have the picture.
content.summary: Its a picture my cousin took in arizona

content.detailedDescription:
It comes around 8pm and just hovers there and leaves five hours later three nights in a row .A bright diamond i have photos and video ill atach
they come every night i wish i new what they are.
content.summary: Its turned up three nights in a row a diamond shape craft stays around five hours or so.

content.detailedDescription:
I was flying to ohio on october 3, 2014 @6:50 a.M. when i saw the most beautiful sunrise over the horizon. i quickly turned on my phone and took two pictures of the sunrise. i later discovered that my phone can alter my underexposed picture in the wright patterson air force museum in dayton.
i just recently decided to notice a small light in my sunrise picture and played with the exposure only to realize that unseen lights were in the picture while flying. 
to this day i had no idea what was hidden in the sunrise. 
my other picture is of an invisible vortex by the san antonio river. you can not see it with the naked eye. i have night pictures of the vortex with orbes in some pictures in my yard. it looks cylindrical and gray with an ora around it in with pulses up and down. the night pictures are awesome.
content.summary: I was taking a picture of beautiful sunrise... i have pictures of invisible vortex day & night

content.detailedDescription: It was evening about a one & a half or 2 years ago htfd ct walking west up my driveway going to go in back door of my house. looking up at low overcast clouds & observed 3 huge white lights in triangle form just above low white clouds slowly traveling west to east huge triangle shape going towards e- hartford wishing somebody was with me!!!Or i wished i had a video recorder..It was slow moving & no sound!!! .Its not the first time i've seen something.When i was about 10 to 12 years old my friend & i were sliding around on the ice on a pond behind his house in wethersfield ct ,it was dark out & we looked up in the sky as we stood there maybe a couple minutes & saw a dark disk shaped craft hovering above us maybe 1000 ft with all different color lights circling around bottom of craft then it darted south.Had to be the mid 1970's i could remember like it  was yesterday!!Could describe it to professional  to draw it?
content.summary: Walking west up driveway looked up saw 3 huge white lights triangle form traveling west to east just above very low overcast clouds

content.detailedDescription: This is not the first time we have seen these lights its like the 5th time within 7 months.What's new this time is the flashes and the 1 bright slow light in that particular area as for the multiple lights we've seen those before in that same area, we finally caught them on camera i've been trying since the first time i saw them in october 2014. planes and helicopters still flew. i don't think the flashes are lightning flashes because its not consistent or widespread its in the same spot
content.summary: Strange lights and flashes various brightness and speed

content.detailedDescription: I won't say
content.summary: Bright coming at me sharp turn back to trees and landed

content.detailedDescription: I have been noticing a strange yellow star diamond like object hovering in my backyard for five or six weeksat first i thought maybe it was the international space station until i had a buddy come over one day and say hey look at that what is that thingso anyway i grab my telescope but i couldn't pinpoint it because it was moving in front back left right slowly but enough where i can pin it down to look at it through my telescope and i went inside and grab mysell phone took about five pictures and put the phone back in my pocket at this point i really didn't know what to think so i tried to look at it through my telescope again when i can hear start tearing the ruler of enginesthis is when i realize that now there are three objects but the second two weren't like to first it seemed to me the second two were military almost flying wing design and they were loud they were going faster than the speed of sound becauseby the time i realized there was something else in the area meaning these two i would say military aircraft which were going way over the speed of sound because i heard the sound behind me so i was looking in that directionand i caught the tail end of one in the total opposite direction and it seemed to me these military jets madetwo passes each at the strange object in the sky which you didn't seem to bother the object it i don't even think it care those military jets were thereafter the military jets came and went i wanted to run inside because my so phone had died it was about 10 below out i put my phone back on the charger put a little layer to close on went back outside and really seeing nothing more from there so i want to head went back in the house and proceeded to look at the five pictures i took of the yellow dimond star looking thingmy amazement when i seen these five pictures i can't even explain i took all five pictures right now bro not even a split-second apart with my phone now two of these pichave a small yellow worm cigar looking thing on it but the other three are what freaked me out these three when you zoom into the object it almost looks likesome kind of person her alien i can explain the difference i took the pictures one right after the other after same object when you look at the pictures i'm going on here please zoom in and make your own opinion i have no idea how picture of a bright yellow start looking craft turns into human looking whatever
content.summary: Strange yellow dimondlike hovern took pi ctures  that look like people in sky

content.detailedDescription: 1-i was at work coming out for a lunch break.2- i noticed it the day before thought nothing of it 3-i just figured it was a drone or small plane.4- the next day around the same time i noticed it and i felt like it was stalking me by now i tried getting closer and it started descending from the sky i drove away and it started going up again.5- i felt like something was following me i was pretty nervous.5- had to go back to work it was gone when i came out.
content.summary: Noticed the same light the day before this time i felt it was watching me the closer i got the lower it would get!!

content.detailedDescription: At first i thought i was seeing a star or planet but realized it was much lower. i have seen it at a distance for 2 nights in a role. tonight i grabbed the binoculars to get a closer look. when i got it into view it looked like a big ball of energy. not solid but like a lose ball of string. and it was pulsating. i have never seen anything quite like it here. and i live close to white sands nm perhaps something they are testing i am not sure. it is just hovering there so i grabbed the camera went out side to see if i could get a close up and well the camera would not take a picture. it may be a camera malfunction. the first picture i took although i could see the object on the screen was completely black and although the several pictures after that seemed to take they were not found on my camera when i went to review. i have lived in my home in the same room for 10+ years and have never seen this object out my window. so not sure what it is or where it has come from.
content.summary: Glowing light in sky

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were out on our back deck just at dusk..We live in a rural area with hills and mountains...Looking to the north we saw two objects in the sky...Both were the same hovering near each other...Arch shaped with 5 or 6 lights pulsating...I ran in to get the binoculars and when i came back they were gone...Less than a 30 second observation but we both saw them and they just disintegrated or disappeared.  it was dusk and the skies were clear...Not the first sighting out here after being in the same house 25 years, but definitely the closest and the clearest. these were not planes...They were there one moment and gone the next....Ive been periodically going out and looking in that direction and have seen nothing.
content.summary: Two arch shapes glowing near each other about 6 lights each

content.detailedDescription: I was at work taking a break. i work nights so it was about 2am. i was sitting on our bench having a cigarette when i noticed a bright light moving north to south at a good speed. i see aircrafts frequently because where i work there is a military base to the east and an airport to the south. i see planes almost every night. this one was different. i was very bright moving south but the lights looked strange. they seemed to be rotating around it no blinking transpondend lights and it was moving at a very good speed. i thought it was odd but didnt think much of it till it slowed and stopped. the lights around it were very bright. orange yellow and red. rotating. as i was watching i guess i could have counted to 5 and it reversed its path and went back the way it came from. slowly at first but it then flew away so quickly it was a blur. literally. ive played this over in my mind and was trying to tell myself what i say was just something mundane. a plane a helicopter even a meteor. but that isnt what i saw. what it was i dont know but i felt compelled to tell what i saw. if this is something mundane and i was just seeing something ordinary please tell me and im cool with that. otherwise im gonna keep watching the sky and keep asking...What if?
content.summary: A glowing ball of rotating lights moved north to the south and stopped in flight slowed and stopped. then reversed course and left at great speed

content.detailedDescription: I was at work thursday morning march 5th 2015 in a suburb of chicago called river grove, i noticed the snow had a pretty ice coating and the way the sun was reflecting off it was pretty cool, so i started snapping multiple pictures (included one before and after event) several minutes later i went back to review my shots taken with my samsung galaxy s3 and to my amazement i had two shots with a strange object dead center of the sun. i proceeded to take multiple more pictures to try and recreate the image with no luck,i am baffled as to what it is i have a total of approximately 20+ photos from same angle only two 3 minutes apart have the object.
content.summary: Snapping random pics of sun

content.detailedDescription: A very bright light source was seen directly west of our home.This should place it above jackson ms.  it would be in the south central part of the city .My wife and i got field glasses to look at it .I am a trained observer in aviation and served a number of years in air search and rescue .I also taught aerospace education and astronomy was a hobby of mine when in my late 20's .This would be as large as a military transport but not being able to know the exact distance that is an estimated guess .The lights appeared to be circular with many (as many as 40 ) there were several colors including white yellow red and green on the lower edge . it stayed in a very small area and at the last time of the sighting it dropped down slowly then after a couple of min . rose back up then moved at a moderate speed to the south . checking back in ten min. we did not see anymore .
content.summary: Wife and i observed a set of lights through our front window and called me . we got field glasses and observed the object for near 30 min. many lights near each other and they were white ..Yellow ..Red and   green on the lower part . it was quiet bright.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside my house shortly after 8 p.M. after my kids went to bed to smoke a cigarette. i was standing on my porch looking out at the sky like i usually do when i noticed a very bright white light in the sky. at first i thought it was a planet, because it was too bright to be a star, but i kept watching it and it didn't seem right with the stars that were usually in the sky this time of night during this time of year. this is my second sighting so i always look closer at things in the sky. the more i watched it, i noticed it was moving very slowly, way too slowly to be an airplane. i live across the river from louisville international airport so we see a lot of planes in the sky; this was not consistent with the behavior of a normal aircraft. over the course of five minutes, it got closer and it was pretty low to the ground, however, not low enough to make out a shape. it was very, very bright and moving very slowly still. i called my husband to come look after it had moved closer and lower, so from this point on, he witnessed what i did. the light became brighter then would fade a little, then became a random quick flashing. i noticed red and blue lights flashing in with the white at times, but the main color was bright white. it looked as if it had a tail, but it wasn't moving quickly enough for it to be anything burning behind it, it had to be light reflecting off of something that made up the structure of the object. it was very cold outside, so after about 20 minutes of watching it hover outside, i came in and could see it outside my window. over a course of five minutes, the light gradually got dimmer, then completely disappeared. i went outside and walked around my backyard to be sure it didn't just move somewhere else, but it was gone. i would have tried to get a picture or video but mmy phone isn't the greatest and with all the streetlights it wouldn't have turned out very well anyway.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought was a star or planet, then slow moving bright flashing light

content.detailedDescription: Out filming a bright star, think it was venus in the west.When i saw this object..Moveing underneath the star headed south west underneath..Unknown object, no sound.
content.summary: Iam ufo watcher..I film all unknown objects i see in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking back from taking the garbage out and saw what looked like a shooting star.  the shooting star/object was moving west away from washington dc, as it was moving west it exploded into two pieces.  it looked like a blue flame that split into two.  half of it went west and the other half moved east and disintegrated.  at that moment i thought it was pretty cool that i saw a shooting star but then thought i never seen a shooting star explode like that.  i then proceeded to look up at the sky and about a minute after i saw the explosion, i looked up and saw what looked like a very big star.  i would say it was comparable to the size of the north star.  the star got bigger and then started to ascend upward and disappeared.  now i am an educated man and have seen dozens of shooting stars but never saw a shooting star explode and then see object in the sky move closer to earth and then ascend upward and out of our atmosphere.  pretty crazy but pretty exciting as well.
content.summary: Explosion then a giant starlike object appeared and ascending

content.detailedDescription: at 7.45 pm on wednesday 4th march 2015 i came out of the house with my girlfiend to go to the local shops it was a clear night as i walked towards the car an amazing  orange vertical light caught my eye i quickly told my girlfriend to look at it so aswell  it seemed to be high up but towering and long vertical and was pulsating getting brighter then fading and brighter again i got my phone out to film it but it couldnt pick it up like the human eye so got my girlfriend to try her iphone  it could only just make it out but just too dark on the phone , it was,nt a chinese lantern as ive seen them before , it was,nt a comet or shooting star as this was just staying in one place and was glowing and it was,nt the northern lights  as they are multi coloured and dancing lights ..This was orange vertical and could,nt see any other lights or objects near to the tower of orange light .. we watched it until it faded to what looked like a star moving away, , when i looked at it and it just felt like it was,nt of this world ..It was something me and my girlfriend will never forget .. , the temperature that night was not that cold so i rule out ice crystals  .. i may never know what it was but feel luck to have seen it
content.summary: Vertical bright orange light high  in sky above north east england  4th march 2015  7.45 pm

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
In the late evening around oct. 23 2013 at approximately 2233 hours.
north valleys, reno-stead, nev.; highway 395

shortly leaving the house to go to work that evening upon getting onto the south bound lane of highway 395 to head towards reno, it was like every other night and routine. there was no clouds with in the sky, and the moon was behind peavine mountain. 

in the far distance, over the hills leading east past sparks, in the direction going towards elko there was a bright light, at first thinking it was a brighter than normal star. after a few seconds it grew brighter and was coming closer; traveling west bound in the sky (upper atmosphere); changing my mind and now thinking is was a meteor coming into atmosphere and passing over the region, me and my wife went to slow down and pull the car over to the side of the road to watch it. 

as it came closer and closer rather quickly, we noticed there was other objects following it, we at first passed it off as debris falling off. which is where the events went from watching a rare event to a once in a life time occurrence that happened very fast and as soon as it started it was over. the object swooped to the left as if it was doing a barrel roll to dodge something, then roughly over the highway about 100-150 yards away from us and other vehicles the object in question appeared to have made an abrupt stop in the air approximately 600 feet above the ground and made a very extreme and hard turn to head north east (ne); this is where i noticed that this object, at this time was triangular shape, with a panel design what may have been the base (underbelly) with a strange design. 

large in size and chrome and grey coloring as well with a hex-base rear with three brightly glowing yellowish-orange orbs that left a bright trail of the same color that faded into white. as the object was making a very deep and low based (beyond baritone) hum, made the sharp left turn and directed the front into an angle, with what appeared to have ejected a spherical object from side; roughly the size of a small car (volkswagen beetle). the secondary object directly after being what seemed ejected out headed south west and gained altitude very quickly leaving a small vapor trail, with unknown jets flying overhead above the highway.

the main object at this point was now gaining altitude and appearing over the hills between lemmon valley and golden valley. suddenly without warning the object exploded in the sky. a very extremely bright explosion which sounded like a very deep â€œboomâ€ like thunder, as well it caused the sky to go from the traditional midnight blue and stars twinkling in the sky to a bright blue, and caused the area to light up very briefly; giving the impression that just a selected area was being viewed like it was around 0700 hours in the morning. appearing shortly after the explosion seems to be two very dark colored / black apache style attack helicopters and a dark colored smaller helicopter passed by overhead coming south heading north east, seeming low headed towards their direction. 

during these events it seemed that there was difficulties with phones, cameras and radios within the area, causing a brief power bump for many. i contacted multiple radio stations to see if they obtained reports of it, as well local law enforcement â€“ all of which detailed no report or knowledge of such events took place that they know of. multiple vehicles that seemed to have noticed the event who either stopped or slowed downed went back to their normal routine. 

after work, returning home that morning roughly around 0907 hours we made a pass by where it appeared to have exploded over on a few dirt trails. no evidence of debris within the area, and no evidence of video, or documentation was filed on the internet or with in the local region or university. 

during the event it felt exciting, as well frightening; not knowing what took place or really how to explain it or who to talk to about the event. as well only able to use artistic talents to detail the ship as being the only evidence while having no photo or video, as well no other eye witnesses stepping forward due to uncertainty or fear of the unknown.
content.summary: Ufo style ship over the north valleys of  northern nevada shot down by unknown military craft

content.detailedDescription: I was working is manvel, texas in early january 2015(not sure of date or time, mid morning. i was looking at the airplanes in the sky because they were leaving vapor trails across the sky. while watching one plane crossing above me going from south to north leaving a vapor trial, i saw a round sphere straight above me. it was round in shape with a bronze color to it. i could only see the bottom of this craft. it did not move, but i was only able to watch it for a few seconds, before the only cloud in the sky drifted under it. i waited a few more minutes hoping to see it again. after the cloud moved away the craft was gone. it's is hard to say how big it was, but it was smaller and lower than the plane passing over. when i saw it, i knew for sure what i was looking at.
content.summary: While watching planes vapor tails in the sky, saw a disc shaped object.

content.detailedDescription: It was night,of course and there was no light in our area at that moment. my sister's fiancÃ©,my father and me were on our home's roof. we live in a 3 story building,we were discussing about personal matters, and i noticed a star,white like a star but bright like a sun.I know all of the stars that observable in southern hemisphere,so i knew it was definitely not a star.So i pointed it out to my sister's fiancÃ© and my father and it was very below from the sky and around 30 to 40 feet above the ground, and then it started to rise upward,very slowly and then stopped at around 100 feet above the ground,then it started to move over a mosque which is just in front of my home and stopped over it,i was recording it all on my nokia 6120c and i still have it, we all were amazed about it,but they were not as much as i am,so i ran downstairs to tell my sisters about what i saw,but they really didn't care,by the time i came back,it was gone.I had a very poor quality camera that time, it was all shaky and low definition, but it was a complete reassemble to what happened in jerusalem ,july 2007.I made this whole video on windows movie maker putting all the evidence at that time,and ignore my grammar,i was only 15 then.
content.summary: A bright light raised above from my neighbours ground and moved over a mosque.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was going to work to start at 630pm.
i decided as early to have a stop up the road as realised to early for work had a ciggerette.

will sound odd, but i looked at what i think was the pole star/north star.. brightest horison star just above the buildings on my right.. this is afar as there was a factory estate yard view between all buildings so i had a good view.
i actually had a thought to ask for help.. or something like that.. bit of one of those stupids thoughts.. what supprised me was 4 sets of 2 lights, that came right from the star area.. like they just switched on.. comming at what i would call fast helecopter speed.

i cannot determine hight as no clowds, but they were high, yet still large.

the had what i would class as two curved lights either side of what looked circular, it was dusk at this time.... this is how they looked () pretty much like glowing bright white flying brackets.

3 flew in a semi straight line, buy slightly up n down, the 4th, suddenly as passed over, changed direction onto another path but in same direction as if changing formation.

there were no lights or sun that could reflect from, nor did the light change shape or intencity from far in horizon from side of star, to far past the opposite side after being overhead. then all 4 vannished, in what i would say was about 130/140 degrees, if you assume 0 degrees on the side of sun first seen and 90 degrees when overhead.

you could see stars overhead in all directions, there were no clouds.

im staying anonn from public, because of my profession, study and standing.
in relation to my initial call to a star resulting in a cercumstantial event, and the fact i now see some alien eyes and face in dreams since, not everyday, not always when asleep.

make of what i said what u will. this isnt the first ufo ive seen or things like esp etc.. but this is the first ufo exp ive witnessed at close range that i cannot conciously deny as being anything other than a ufo.
content.summary: 4 ufos flew from what i think was pole star, overhead and off one direction.

content.detailedDescription: The spaceship looked circle, radiated a red light, went from right to left, just vanished in thin air. i really didn't want to talk about it but i have had 1 vision and it communicated with me telepathically. it said they tied reasoning with us humans, but we won't listen, and that humans only want there technology, and finally said he doesn't want any part of it.
content.summary: The spaceship radiated a red light

content.detailedDescription: ive had premonitions about things for awhile now and am known for being psycic to friends and family. ive had this thing under my skin for some time now, and sometimes a feel it inside my arm. when i do i sometimes feel i should take a walk and then ill see things or ill be able to predict things. this time a had the feeling whatever it is was, was sending msgs to me not to doubt my capabilities and that i wasnt crazy and to use a magnet on my arm to  prove to myself this was legitamate. i was working on my showbike at the time and had my starter apart. they  starter selenoid houses very strong magnets. when i put the magnet to my forearm, i felt a pop! and now i have a visibly obvious anomily under the skin that i can raise  with a magnet creating a kind of indian "tp" affect. im at a loss and im not scared to say i hope im not pissing them off by doing this. help!  i would like someone to tell me what the hell is going on! please!
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ive witnessed before! and i have something under my skin . of forearm that i can move visibly with a magnet!! hhheeelllppp!!!
